title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Motor
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Motor 

Insurance) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (motor insurance) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 2. Regulation 5 of the European Union (Motor Insurance) Regulations of
text_raw:
2. Regulation 5 of the European Union (Motor Insurance) Regulations of 

2023 (S.I. No. 643 of 2023) is amended by deleting paragraph (3). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 February, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

1 OJ L 430, 2.12.2021, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [65] 3

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend Regulation 5 of the European Union (Motor 
Insurance) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 643 of 2023) by deleting paragraph (3), 
which amended the European Communities (Non-Life Insurance) Regulations 
1976 (S.I. No. 115 of 1976). These Regulations were previously revoked by 
section 20(1) of the Finance (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2015 (No. 37 of 
2015). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [65]
